name.description: The name property of all input[type="checkbox"] children
name.description_zh: CheckboxGroup 下所有 `input[type="checkbox"]` 的 `name` 属性

:options.description: Specifies options, you can customize label with slot = "label" slot-scope="option"
:options.type: string[] | Array<{ label: string value: string disabled?: boolean, indeterminate?: boolean, onChange?: function }>
:options.description_zh: 指定可选项，可以通过 slot="label" slot-scope="option" 定制label

value.description: Used for setting the currently selected value.

events.name: change
events.description: The callback function that is triggered when the state changes.
